The first synth to support the MIDI standard, the Prophet-600, was released in December 1982. That's around 36 years ago!

Here's how MIDI's release date compares to other protocols:

FTP: 1971
TCP: 1974
MIDI: 1982
HTTP: 1991
SSH: 1995
BitTorrent: 2001
Bitcoin: 2009
HTTP2: 2015pic.twitter.com/ggjrmc7ZIC

Just enabled "OCSP stapling" on all my sites.

Find out if the compromised 'event-stream' dependency is on your machine.

 Just run this:

cd ~/code

find . -type d -name "event-stream" -print0 | xargs -n 1 -0 -I % sh -c "(cat %/package.json | npx json version) && echo '(at %)'"

Look for "3.3.6" in the output
